history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: RmaxRmult. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rmult_max_distr_l,RmaxRmult.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of RmaxRmult (Rmax (_ * _) (_ * _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H0 : forall p q r : R, 0 <= r -> Rmax (r * p) (r * q) = r * Rmax p q a, b : R -> R c, H : R X : Riemann_integrable a c H X0 : Riemann_integrable b c H Unable to unify "?M2815 * Rmax ?M2816 ?M2817 = Rmax (?M2815 * ?M2816) (?M2815 * ?M2817)" with "forall eps : posreal, {phi : StepFun c H & {psi : StepFun c H | (forall t : R, Rmin c H <= t <= Rmax c H -> Rabs ((fun x : R => a x + b x) t - phi t) <= psi t) /\\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}}".

original: intros a b c H. rewrite RmaxRmult. apply Rmult_max_distr_l. auto.
